title: Hong Kong, Singapore: fragrant harbour, lion city

description: Episode of Series "Asian insight". A look at the cultural background of Hong Kong and Singapore. Both places are governed by the professional elite ruling class. However, they have produced very different societies under the pressure of history and circumstances. Sujitable for upper secondary level.
